concept.title: Debugging Auth Delegate
concept.shortdesc: You can log a user in through the console during integration and testing to debug authorization.

conbody.p: Log a user in through the console using the following auth.authenticate (token) and pass a Livefyre user token to authenticate users on the page.
You may also modify the example shown above, and add the following snippet in-line in your JavaScript to quickly log a user into Livefyre (requires a reference to auth).
